revised_title: On the Reversal of the Lines of Metallic Vapours: New Observations and Recommendations
tldr: This article discusses the author's experiments on the reversal of lines in metallic vapours using the electric arc and lime crucibles. They observed the reversal of lines in various metals, such as calcium, sodium, and potassium, and made recommendations for the use of specific metal alloys in manufacturing. The authors also noted the effects of introducing different gases into the crucibles on the appearance of the lines.
